WorkItem.Description:
There is a little mistake in the NumericUpDown class (NumericUpDown.xaml.cs). At the accessors for the "ShowButtons" property the getter and setter used the "_value " variable instead of the "_showButtons" variable. So it´s not possible to set the state. However, when someone try to set this property "true" or "false", the programm throw an exception. The datatype of the _value variable is double and so it don´t work with a bool.
To correct this mistake you need to change the NumericUpDown.xaml.cs file.
The accessor starts at line 152. Now you only need to replace "_value" in line 156 and 160 with "_showButtons". Ready.
